name: "OneRoom" - A 3D Platformer
description:
This is a short jumping game made for the Indie Tales Game Jam. It's pretty basic but I hope you enjoy!

Your goal is to climb the boxes and moving platforms and reach the fancy pedestal.

Be careful not to fall off the moving platforms - you don't stick to them quite as well as I'd like.

Controls:

WASD to move, Space to jump, mouse to look around.

Press Escape to free the mouse, and click on the game window to recapture it.
